text: Court records stored OSCN. Usually people type whatever information case, whether case number , simply name party involved case. bring case information list documents associated case. purposes, interested document code FEDS. stands Forcible Entry Detainer Served, address interest located.

text: addresses Tulsa County … weird. can ‘half’ street numbers. Often times people mis attribute 1/2 street name rather number. See screen shots . Including 1/2 street number correctly validates, including street name fails.

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: Given high-priority critical nature project, suggest using either Full Manual Human---Loop strategy. fully automated solution simply won’t give level address coverage sufficient needs. Selection two remaining strategies matter weigh, whether sufficient ability contract/hire someone part-time onboard perform functions; whether remote, platform-based workforce required. estimation Human--Loop strategy way go. ample room increase confidence threshold required automated address transcription, coverage approaches level Full Manual approach. addition manual labor portion process ‘code-’ interaction. human resources involved, beyond developer. move forward Human---Loop strategy, suggest 2-4 week trial run pricing address transcription via distributed workforce system Amazon Mechanical Turk. require minimal development allow us get concrete sense cost associated manual labor.

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: Cheapest solution Stable cost time Least coverage Extensive development time improve model

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: expensive solution Stable cost time coverage Little development time Local remote labor

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: Can modify confidence threshold increase coverage Cost approaches full manual solution increased confidence Local remote labor, local solution takes development Cost varies demand HITs using remote labor Requires infrastructure

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: Deployed script download store documents new evictions Deployed script document pre-processing Cropping Contrast boosting Deployed script address validation standardization

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: OCR/computer vision processing Address extraction (needed cropping irregular)

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: Remote Platform specific script submit new cases Local Simple platform data entry delivery back OJO

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: full automation infrastructure Remote local manual infrastructure Remote Script pricing HITs according demand

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: Pricing various infrastructure components stage imperfect say least, though easier others. addressed Proposal section, depending strategy selected, need trial period estimate total costs. largely relevant Human---Loop strategy, requires dynamic pricing achieve kind coverage eviction addresses desired. Actual cloud computing costs minimal cases. bulk cost comes manual labor platform fees.

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: Estimating monthly case load ~2000 evictions, cost Full Automation strategy cost less $100 per month. 100% cost cloud computing, stays within free-tier cloud services.

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: using case load 2000/month, adding labor cost $15/hr, assuming labor speed 100 addresses transcribed per hour, estimate total cost around $500/month. precise testing many addresses reasonably typed. need approximate system workers using perform task.

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: Pricing strategy full unfortunately possible without kind trial. However, can use infrastructure cost Full Automation strategy, together additional infrastructure costs, arrive estimate less $150/month cloud computing resources. can assume total human labor cost strategy exceed Full Manual strategy, can include $400/month labor cost, arriving upper estimate less $600/month.

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: Regardless chosen strategy significant labor involved set seamless workflow. However, development labor required strategy varies greatly direct trade-data-entry manual labor. work already done deploying infrastructure common strategies completed rapidly. strategy specific tasks require research optimization fly, time estimates less solid. addition, ’ll provide two time estimates task. first represent actual time spent project, whereas second represent number weeks necessary deliver task given current workload.

title: Eviction Addresses Pipeline
text: Using infrastructure cost estimates , one-time development estimates, maintenance cost 5% development, total cost strategy given .

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: repo contains data-entry dashboard, well API facilitate collection validation eviction addresses OSCN.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: created scheduled triggers call /refresh /hydrate endpoints API periodically. /refresh endpoint searches new eviction cases associated documents database. also gathers minutes previosuly collected cases, since documents uploaded OSCN case progresses. records entered case document tables eviction_addresses schema. Next, queue table cleansed jobs already completed. New cases least one document added queue. long process, care must taken ensure timeouts occur. timeout least 20 minutes recommended. timeout defined seconds within build yaml generated build R files root repo.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: use Postgrid address verification service. billed per address, use live Postgrid API key need , testing.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Deployment occurs either testing production environments push code dev main branch Github, respectively. made possible Google Cloud Build Triggers. Currently trigger enabled manually, created build build_test files using {googleCloudRunner}.

text: Format PostGrid Request

title: Format PostGrid Request — format_postgrid_request
code: format_postgrid_request(   line1 = NA_character_,   line2 = NA_character_,   city = NA_character_,   state = "ok",   zip = NA_character_,   country = "us",   street_number = NA_character_,   street_direction = NA_character_,   street_name = NA_character_,   street_type = NA_character_,   unit = NA_character_ )

title: Format PostGrid Request — format_postgrid_request
text: line1 first line address line2 second line address (e.g. unit/suite/apartment) city city address state state address zip five-digit zip code address country two letter country code street_number building number address's street street_direction street direction address street_name name address's street (including post-direction, e.g. 68th E) street_type type address's street (e.g. street/avenue/place) unit unit type value address (e.g. APT 13, UNIT C)
